name: The Moon Race
description:
You are one of the few Pioneers who set off from Earth to the unknown. Your first destination? The Moon. However, Space is the new wild west, and many Pioneers before you have fallen to the so-called Space Pirates. Can you survive the onslaught and reach the unknown?

How To Play

Survive until you reached the Moon. Attack enemies by left or right-clicking them.

Each attack costs Energy, which is displayed on the bottom right alongside your current Energy. The left icon shows the left-click attack cost, and the right icon shows the right-click attack cost.

Refill Energy by forming an English word out of the provided letters on the bottom-left. Each letter has its Energy value derived from its inherent Scrabble value. You will also gain bonus Energy the longer the word is.
